title: Match history not updating
body: Title. Played 2 enjoyable ARAM games but when i check my match history its still the one i played the other day. Anyone else got this problem?

replies.body:
Hey Too much rage,

I'm seeing it on your op.gg match history, so the games are definitely recorded. http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=too+much+rage
Is it not showing up in your client?
i have the exact some problem at the moment man :) i think it's just a bug or something
Haha glad im not the only one :P
They are still not showing up in my client after I restarted my computer. Im looking at it now from my other account and it still isnt updated

Hey Too much rage,

I've reached out to some folks at Riot, and I'll let you know if there's an update on the issue that I can share.
Awesome! Thank you for letting me know it makes me feel better :)

Hey Too much rage,

NOC posted an update about the issue a few hours ago:
>Network Operations â€“ 4:58 AM
We are aware of issues with match history, end of games stats and Bilgewater rewards progress not working properly. We're currently investigating.

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#oce
